lx4p

Class LXmDNSDiscoverer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXmDNSDiscoverer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LXmDNSDiscoverer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    LXmDNSDiscoverer is a class for implementing mDNS discovery of devices on a local network. LXmDNSDiscoverer receives DNS packets on a thread and informs its delegate of their contents.
    Version:
    001
    Author:
    Claude Heintz
    See Also:
    LXUPnPDelegate

      • createLXmDNSDiscoverer

        public static LXmDNSDiscoverer createLXmDNSDiscoverer(java.lang.String networkInterface,
                                                      java.lang.String networkAddress,
                                                      java.lang.String target,
                                                      int type,
                                                      int printing)
        Factory method to create an LXmDNSDiscoverer
        Parameters:
        networkInterface - if not null, searches for an InetAddress associated with the named interface (eg "en0")
        networkAddress - specific IP address to use for binding socket. Can be null if networkInterface is specified
        target - is the desired name passed to the LXmDNSDiscoverer constructor
        type - is passed to the LXmDNSDiscoverer constructor
        printing - indicated what level of messages should be printed
        Returns:
        created instance of LXUPnPDiscovereror null if socket could not be opened
